attributes.action: Have a referendum for reversing devolution in the UK
attributes.additional_details: the Devolved parliaments have failed to do the job it was set up for and now needs to be reversed and all powers returned to Westminster
attributes.background: Devolution in the UK has failed and needs to be reversed and all powers returned to Westminster

rejection.details: We can only accept petitions when the petition creator provides their full name. The email address used to start this petition has been used to start several petitions using different names. If you want to start a new petition you will need to get in touch at petitionscommittee@parliament.uk to confirm your name.
